content.question: If <math alttext="y equals the square root of 3 times x squared plus 1, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator 2 times the square root of 6 x, end root, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator 2 times the square root of 3 times x squared, plus 1, end root, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 x, and denominator the square root of 3 times x squared, plus 1, end root, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="3 x times the square root of 3 times x squared plus 1, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>‚Å¢</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 x, and denominator the square root of 3 times x squared, plus 1, end root, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions
